author: William Feuer
title: Massachusetts under "stay-at-home" order until April 7, Gov. Baker announces
description: Massachusetts Gov. Charlie Baker issued an emergency order on Monday to close all non-essential businesses across the state to curb the spread of COVID-19.
content:
Massachusetts Gov. Charlie Baker issued an emergency order on Monday to close all nonessential businesses across the state to curb the spread of COVID-19. 
"I am issuing the following emergency order: effective Tuesday March 24th at noon, all nonessential bu… [+1301 chars]
